metadata.title: CVE-2017-13099 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: wolfSSL prior to version 3.12.2 provides a weak Bleichenbacher oracle whenany TLS cipher suite using RSA key exchange is negotiated. An attacker canrecover the private key from a vulnerable wolfSSL application. Thisvulnerability is referred to as "ROBOT."

criterions.comment: wolfssl: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
